trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> from other data types.
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollectionConverter"></xref> class.
Returns a value that indicates whether this converter can convert an object of the given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
Describes the context information of a type.
The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
`true` if the converter can convert the provided type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> can be converted to a different type.
Describes the context information of a type.
The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
`false` is always returned because the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> cannot be converted to another type.
Attempts to convert a specified object to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
Describes the context information of a type.
Describes the <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> of the type being converted.
The object being converted.
The instance of created from the converted input.
Occurs if input is `null` or is not a valid type for conversion.
Attempts to convert a specified string to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
The string value of the `text` parameter can either be "None", or a combination of the predefined <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration> names delimited by commas, such as "Underline, Strikethrough".
The names are case-insensitive values.
One or more blanks spaces can precede or follow each text decoration name or comma.
In addition, duplicate text decoration names are not allowed.
The <xref href="System.String"></xref> to be converted into the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> object.
The instance of created from the converted text.
Attempts to convert an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> to a specified type.
Describes the context information of a type.
Describes the <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> of the type being converted.
The instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> to convert.
The type this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> is converted to.
`null` is always returned because <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> cannot be converted to any other type.
